BuyAndSell.connect-title: Trade with us through Telegram and Facebook
BuyAndSell.local-title: Trade with us on LocalCryptos and LocalBitcoins
BuyAndSell.swap-title: Want to exchange Crypto to Crypto?
BuyAndSell.payment-title: We support payment methods in Cambodia

1.q: How do I Buy and Sell Bitcoin with you?
1.a: We support all major payment methods in Cambodia. Get in contact with us through Telegram, Facebook, LocalCryptos.com and LocalBitcoins.com.

3.a: We have been trading cryptocurrency and building a reputation in Cambodia for quite some time. Click on the links above to fund us on LocalCryptos.com and LocalBitcoins.com two of the most trusted P2P trading platforms.

4.a: We charge between 3% to 10% depending on the current demand and supply. Go to our Live Rates page to find out more.

5.q: Can I get a better rate for larger volume transactions?
5.a: This can sometimes be the case. Please get in contact with us so we can discuss this further.

6.a: For Ethereum, DAI and USDC the minimum amount is $55. For Bitcoin, the minimum amount is $200.

7.q: When should I receive my funds?
7.a: It takes 1 - 30 minutes depending on the Blockchain. We recommend using Ethereum or ERC20 Tokens like DAI and USDC if you wish faster confirmation.

8.a: If you have an account with a cryptocurrency exchange service like Binance, go to Wallet -> Deposit and then select the coin. You will see a long random-looking addressstring, that is your address, you can share this address it with us to receive your coins.

9.q: How do I get a cryptocurrency wallet address?
9.a: If you have an account with a cryptocurrency exchange service like Binance, go to Wallet -> Deposit and then select the coin. You will see a long random-looking string, that is your address, you can share it with us to receive your coins.

10.q: Why isn't my Bitcoin showing in my wallet?
10.n: The time it will take for the Bitcoin to show up depends on which wallet or exchange you are using to receive the Bitcoin. This is usually because they require more network confirmation for the Bitcoin to become visible in your account.
